scripts.say: And now I'd like to announce the first Annual Gaming Party as having officially begun!
HOORAAAAAAAY! DA-DA-DADA
We bring you a hyperdimensional fusion of materials provided by Akashi, technical know-how provided by Yuubari, and game discs Noire brought with her from Gamindustri!
We bring you... A hyperdimensional event! For the whole day, the academy will be one giant arcade! Now come, everyone! Play and enjoy yourselves to your heart's content!
HOORAAAAAAAY! DA-DA-DADA
I didn't provide anything for free, nya. I will get my share of the profits you earn from this event down to the last cent. Capiche?

Hum hum, I'd never come across gaming technology from another dimension before... But now that I have, I can say it was an invigorating experience! Could I use these as reference for designing some new equipment?
W-well, it's only natural a CPU from Gamindustri would have some spare games on her... Ahahahaha... (Now I can't go and tell them I just happened to bring them with me...)
It's all thanks to Noire that we'll be able to have so much fun today!
You heard it, folks! This lady here who brought tons of the latest and greatest games is our MVP! A round of applause for the wonderful Noire! Clap clap clap!
HOORAAAAAAAY! DA-DA-DADA!
Um, well, you know... Hahaha, this is just, um, how I roll as a CPU! Go on, enjoy yourselves today! It's all on me!
It's amazing they're able to hold an event as big as this... I see! Noire really knows her stuff! This must be why they call it "item management"!
I am amazed as well... After all, planning something is easy, but to realize it is not.
Well, Neptune was the one who proposed it, but halfway in she got bored and left everything to me. Who knows how poorly things could have gone if I wasn't here to take over...
But still, I'm glad I get to make everyone happy.
...I haven't seen you smile in a long time, Noire.
Did you say something, Blanc?
...No, nothing... Now, Ranger and KÃ¼nne, come along and I'll teach you the true joy of visual novels...
...The literary nature of visual novels, how to read and analyze a story, how to make the right choices... I'll teach you everything there is to know...
We will follow your lead, Miss Blanc!
We are as always thankful for your guidance, Miss Blanc!
Miss Blanc...? What have you been teaching them...?
...Just some stuff from the library.
BANG! BANG BANG! POW! BA-BOOOOM!
Firefight, firepower, firefight, firepower... Ahh, I don't have enough ammo!
Ayanami! You've gotta bring me some ammo, otherwise we're gonna lose!
You'll have to do something about that on your own... Things are only getting worse for me over here as well!
Ohoho... I see you have much to learn. You're both newbies, aren't you? Did you really think you could beat me in a tactical shooter?
...I guess you're really good at this after all, Vert...!
It's a 2v1, we're supposed to have the advantage, so how come we're losing~?
...Truth is, I've been on Vert's side all along.
As have I!
What?! No wonder your team's got better stats than we do! But that makes this a 3v2!
That's not fair! You play dirty, Vert...!
Hohoho... There are no rules in war. Also, deceiving the enemy could be thought of as a tactic. Perhaps you've learned something today.
I see... Then we will call for some reinforcements as well!
Indeed! Only a coward with no morals would stand by and watch! I will assist Ayanami and Long Island!
What's more, now's the time to use the ace up our sleeves!
KABOOOOOOOM!
Eeeeek?! They've turned the tables on us, Vert!
Now they have the same stas as us, and they made it a 3v3...
Oh dear, and in the blink of an eye we're not winning anymore. We're most likely going to lose.
But... Some people play games precisely because they want a challenge, you know?
I see! So at this corner you do a four-wheel drift!
That was good, Ikazuchi. It seems you picked a model with good steering.
What the heck! I picked the fastest car there is, so why can't I win?!
I think it's because you can't handle all that speed.
In racing games, how well you can control your vehicle, how many shortcuts you can take, and going as fast as possible without going off course are more important than just going the fastest...
And all you were doing was putting the pedal to the metal and crashing into things.
Then I'll turn at the curve properly this... Nep?! I totaled my car again!
And while Nep-Nep's busy with that, I'm gonna slamdunk that finish line! It's victory lap time!
Bravo, Ikazuchi... I'm just behind you... It seems we will never lose first and second place. I think it's time for some victory champagne...
You got me... But let's play one more round! Just one more! Come on, man
You can try again all you want but you're just gonna lose every time.
Nuh-uh, no way! I will win eventually as long as I keep trying!
If you're gonna be that way then fine. I guess I'll give you as much advice as I can, too.
You seem to be having quite the time! I permit you to accept me as a team member! Now let us play a game that will appease me!
Sure thing, Lizzy! Whaddya wanna play?
A game brimming with elegance fit for a queen as myself, of course! And you will prepare the very best that will satisfy me! Understood?!
Her Majesty seems to have become interested in games as of late... If you don't mind, may I ask you to let us play with you?
No probs, you guys are welcome any time. Whaddya wanna play, O Spite of War?
Spite of War...? Well, whatever... Hmm, let's see... I'd like to try a war game. As in, a game teeming with violence in a battle to the death... Do you have anything like that?
Then maybe what you want is a fighting game or action game? They're pretty realistic.
You do? In that case... I would love to try one of those!
Hahaha... This is my chance to show you the tricks I've learned at the Gamer Club! Warspite, fetch me a bottle of soda and a bag of crisps at once!
Your Majesty, those are not required in order to play video games...
